name: Baron Zemo (Core)
description: Baron Helmut Zemo is a high-ranking member of Hydra and a constant enemy of the Avengers and Captain America. A brilliant scientist, expert swordsman, and cunning tactician, Zemo has proven to be a danger the world can ill afford to ignore. While he has worked under the Red Skull's leadership, Zemo constantly watches for the moment when he can usurp the Red Skull and take his rightful place as the head of Hydra.
